traverse_forwards_using_while_loop.Title: Traverse Forwards through Linked List Using While Loop
traverse_forwards_using_while_loop.Input Data: 7 nodes with the following values in order 300, 130, 204, 200, 25, 50, 120
Description: We setup a linked list with nodes from 7 to 1 and then traverse it using a while loop. The
while loop iteratively loops through each node and then loads the next_node object for the next

traverse_reverse_using_stack.Title: Traverse reverse through Linked List using a stack method
traverse_reverse_using_stack.Input Data: 7 nodes with the following values in order 300, 130, 204, 200, 25, 50, 120

reverse_order_by_reversing_links.Title: Reverse linked list by reversing links
reverse_order_by_reversing_links.Input Data: 7 nodes with the following values in order 300, 130, 204, 200, 25, 50, 120
Description: Each node in the linked list has a next_node property. In this demo we iterate
through each node saving it as a temporary variable and then when we reach
the next node we set its next node to the previous temp node.

reverse_order_using_recursion.Title: Reverse order using recursion
reverse_order_using_recursion.Input Data: 7 nodes with the following values in order 300, 130, 204, 200, 25, 50, 120
Description: Here we reverse the order of a linked list using a recursive method.
